scripts.build: tsc && mkdir -p api && cp build/httpServer.js api/
scripts.build:vercel: tsc && mkdir -p api && cp build/httpServer.js api/
scripts.test: npm run build && node -e "console.log('Testing build files...'); require('./build/index.js'); console.log('✅ index.js loads successfully');" && node -e "console.log('Testing httpServer...'); require('./build/httpServer.js'); console.log('✅ httpServer.js loads successfully');" && echo '✅ All tests passed!'
